content:
Let's play a little puzzle game! Can you use your reasoning skills to figure out the year in which Bob Dylan was born? I'll give you a hint, it's hidden in the table below. Can you find it?
| Name        | Birthdate   |
| ----------- | -----------|
| Bob Dylan   |  May 24, 1941 |
I'm excited to see if you can crack this puzzle!
It looks like the answer to the puzzle is hidden right in the table you provided. Bob Dylan was born on May 24, 1941. So, the year you're looking for is 1941!
